articles.title: Nicola Coughlan Barbie Premiere Outfit - BuzzFeed
articles.description: Bridgerton star Nicola Coughlan walked the pink carpet at the Barbie premiere in London in a stunning dress that was inspired by a Barbie doll she had growing up.

articles.title: Lamborghini reveals new SC63 LMDh for 2024 WEC, IMSA seasons - Autosport
articles.description: Lamborghini has unveiled the new LMDh hybrid prototype with which it will contest the World Endurance Championship and the IMSA SportsCar Championship from next year.
articles.content:
The covers came off a car to be known as the Lamborghini SC63 at the Goodwood Festival of Speed on Thursday.
Its nomenclature combines the SC used on a trio of specials developed by the Lamborghini … [+2886 chars]

articles.title: iOS 16.5.1 (c)—Update Now Warning Issued To All iPhone Users - Forbes
articles.description: Apple has just released iOS 16.5.1, a Rapid Security Response update that should be applied by all iPhone users.
articles.content:
Apple iOS 16.5.1 (c) has arrived, along with a warning to update now. Thats because iOS 16.5.1 (c) is an urgent iPhone security update that fixes a flaw already being used in real-life attacks.
The … [+3314 chars]

articles.title: Has a 25-year-old bet taken us a step closer to understanding consciousness? – podcast - The Guardian
articles.description: Twenty-five years ago in a German bar, neuroscientist Christof Koch bet philosopher David Chalmers that we’d understand the neural basis for consciousness by 2023. Last month, the winner of the bet received a case of wine. Ian Sample talks to Christof and Dav…
